pinit.config.title: PinIt Config
pinit.config.option.pinShape.tooltip: Changes the shape of the pin
pinit.config.option.pinColor.tooltip: Changes the color of the pin
pinit.config.option.totalCountMode.toolt: If enabled, the HUD will display the combined total of an item found across your entire inventory. If disabled, it only shows the stack size in the specific pinned slot.
pinit.config.option.enableSlotPinning.to: Completely toggles the slot pinning feature. If disabled, you cannot pin/unpin inventory slots. (saved pins are preserved).
Completely toggles the recipe pinning feature. If disabled, you cannot pin/unpin recipes in the recipe book (saved pins are preserved)
